subject: feat(pwa): add app icons (SVG + PNG) and update favicon
body:
Custom graph-nodes icon: 4 indigo corner nodes connected by arcs with
an amber center node on dark background. Matches the app theme.

- icon.svg: scalable vector for favicon and modern manifest
- icon-192.png, icon-512.png: rasterized for PWA manifest
- icon-512-maskable.png: padded safe-zone variant for Android adaptive icons
- index.html: favicon now points to icon.svg, added apple-touch-icon

Tags: pwa, icons, branding
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: pwa-hardening
Semver: patch
